Acknowledgements.title: Acknowledgements
Acknowledgements.subtitle1: The studio is made up of those who are there and those who will always be there.
Acknowledgements.quote: Those who pass us by don't go alone, they don't leave us alone. They leave a little of themselves behind, they take a little of us with them.
